name: ldualneg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0

stmt.origin: 3eqtr4g(c0, c1, cfv(cminusg, c5), cfv(cminusg, cfv(coppr, c2)), w0)

⊣ (w0 →(invg ` c5)=(invg `(oppR ` c2)))

⊣ c1 =(invg `(oppR ` c2))
